{/* Overview / Top */}
{/* Intro */}

AI-crypto radar

Ride signals, not noise.

Spot momentum early, track narratives, and publish in minutes.

{/* CHANGED: primary CTA uses brand gradient */} Get Early Access See How it Works
{/* HOW IT WORKS */}

How it works

{/* Ingest */}
{/* cloud arrow */}

Ingest

Stream newest AI-crypto tweets & on-chain/news signals.

{/* Understand */}
{/* brain */}

Understand

Sarcasm-aware sentiment + theme/topic clustering + trend labels.

{/* Act */}
{/* rocket */}

Act

Agentic post generator & scheduled threads窶排eview, edit, publish.

{/* CORE FEATURES (uniform typography) */}
{/* soft section aura */}

What you get

Core features

Built for AI-crypto speed
{/* 1) Live Narrative Radar */}
{/* radar icon */}

Live Narrative Radar

  • 窶｢ Streams tweets plus key news/on-chain signals in near real time
  • 窶｢ Alias normalization and spam/dup filtering for clean token feeds
  • 窶｢ Real-time prices and 24h/7d changes from CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko

Data sources: CoinMarketCap ﾂｷ CoinGecko

{/* 2) Signal Engine */}
{/* brain icon */}

Signal Engine

  • 窶｢ Sarcasm-aware sentiment and theme/topic clustering
  • 窶｢ Token-level trend labels: Good / Bad / Neutral
  • 窶｢ Narrative maps and word clouds per token
{/* 3) Viral Post Studio */}
{/* megaphone */}

Viral Post Studio

  • 窶｢ Drafts tweets/threads from positive-momentum tokens
  • 窶｢ Smart hashtag suggestions and hook ideas
  • 窶｢ Image and short-video generation to match the post窶冱 angle
{/* 4) Meme Lab */}
{/* image/smile */}

Meme Lab

  • 窶｢ Upload an image to generate a timely crypto meme
  • 窶｢ Fetches what窶冱 trending now to shape the joke
  • 窶｢ Agent returns the edited meme image and caption
{/* INSIGHTS GALLERY 窶 PYRAMID (1 + 2) */}

Recent narratives

Insights gallery

Auto-refreshed snapshots
{/* 12-col grid keeps everything perfectly aligned */}
{/* Top center HERO */}

NEAR narrative spike

  • 窶｢ Mentions +240% in 6h
  • 窶｢ Sentiment flips to Good
  • 窶｢ Velocity rising; #AI + #infra cluster
  • 窶｢ Influencer overlap 竊
See method
{/* Bottom row: two aligned tiles */}

RNDR funding chatter

  • 窶｢ VC mentions +3 sources
  • 窶｢ Neutral drifting toward Good

FET controversy cool-off

  • 窶｢ Negativity 竏35% w/w
  • 窶｢ Mentions normalizing to baseline
{/* USE CASES 窶 INVERTED PYRAMID (2 + 1) */}

Use cases

Solo 竊 Desk 竊 Fund
{/* Top row: two balanced tiles */}

Trader

Catch momentum early

Spot moves fast, filter by tokens/themes, and react in minutes.

Get Early Access

Fund

Monitor sectors at a glance

Build watchlists, track sector flows, and generate LP updates instantly.

Request Access
{/* Bottom center: hero card */}

Research

Track narratives & synthesize

Compare themes, surface top tweets, and export snapshots for weekly notes.

Join the Waitlist
{/* SECURITY */}

Security & compliance

  • {/* shield-check */} Non-custodial: we never hold your funds.
  • {/* lock */} API keys are stored securely (env) and never logged.
  • {/* users */} Role-based access planned for team workspaces.
  • {/* clipboard-check */} Audits: integrations reviewed; formal audits planned.
  • {/* scale */} Disclaimers: TrendAI provides analytics only, not financial advice.
  • {/* shield */} Privacy: personal data minimized by design.
{/* PRICING */}

Pricing

{/* billing toggle */}
{/* FAQ */}

FAQ

What is TrendAI?

A platform to track AI-crypto narratives, sentiment, and generate on-brand social content.

How often is data refreshed?

We scan continuously and surface fresh signals; dashboards update throughout the day.

Do you support watchlists and alerts?

Watchlists and alerts are on the roadmap. Join the waitlist to get early access.

{/* CONTACT / WAITLIST */}

Join the waitlist

Be the first to try new features and dashboards.
